backend/main.mo: Defines clinic configs, patient submissions, professionals, and user profiles with access control and multiple query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports mapping feature IDs to impacted files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining light/dark theme CSS variables with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster for the application.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication with patient-page-specific behavior.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting authenticated users to enter their name if no profile exists.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Route guard that restricts access to authenticated users and shows an access denied screen otherwise.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Dashboard filter bar providing search and date filtering inputs with icons.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Export: Generates and downloads a CSV of submission data, using structured fields or parsing fallback text.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Submis: Displays a list of submissions with name, room, and date, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/forms/FormSectio: A styled container component for form sections.
frontend/src/components/forms/RequiredMa: Renders a red asterisk for required fields.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Displays the app footer with branding, year, and a referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the top navigation with logo, view toggles, and login button based on authentication state.
Wraps the app layout with header, footer, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/team/PatientDeta: Displays detailed patient submission information with optional WhatsApp action.
frontend/src/components/team/Questionnai: Shows questionnaire responses with scores, answers, and optional feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useClinicTeam.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update clinic member lists via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a minimal wrapper hook returning actor and loading state from useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmissions.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch, submit, and update patient submissions using the actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Implements hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile via the actor with React Query caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Contains Tailwind base styles, theming variables for light/dark mode, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays patient submissions with filtering, export, and navigation to team pages.
frontend/src/pages/ExamSuccessPage.tsx: Shows exam completion details and offers WhatsApp result sharing for a selected patient.
frontend/src/pages/PatientFormPage.tsx: Renders the patient intake form and submits structured data to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionSuccessPage: Shows a confirmation message after successful patient registration submission.
frontend/src/pages/TeamManagementPage.ts: Allows medical staff to review and update a patient's submission, including WhatsApp communication.
frontend/src/utils/patientSubmissionDeta: Builds a detailed view-model for PatientSubmission, combining structured fields with fallback context parsing and formatting timestamps, scores, and status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL parameters, supporting both query strings and hash-based routing with sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Normalizes phone numbers, extracts patient and medical data from structured fields or context, and generates a formatted WhatsApp message for patients.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project metadata, tracked features, new requests, and versioned project state information.
